title: Season VI Trailer
description:
Your patience, your penance, your sacrifice... have been accepted. Season VI drops 9/3/21! Brace yourself, you may jump up in fright, and please (no matter what) don’t turn off that light.

Get ready for 26 brand NEW Spooked episodes! Never miss an episode - subscribe to the Luminary channel on Apple Podcasts to get new episodes as they become available.

Be afraid.
